SELECT bi.id AS id, bi.bus_key AS devKey, bi.ip_addr AS ipAddr, bi.run_status AS runStatus, bi.bus_name AS busName, bi.is_deleted AS isDeleted, bi.create_time AS createTime, bi.update_time AS updateTime, ab.path AS path, ab.aisle_id AS aisleId, ab.bus_key AS barKey FROM bus_index bi LEFT JOIN aisle_bar ab ON bi.bus_key = ab.bus_key
bi.is_deleted = 0
and bi.bus_key in
#{item}

SELECT bi.id AS id, bi.box_key AS devKey, bi.ip_addr AS ipAddr, bi.box_id AS barId, bi.run_status AS runStatus, bi.box_name AS busName, bi.is_deleted AS isDeleted, bi.create_time AS createTime, bi.update_time AS updateTime, ab.aisle_id AS aisleId, ab.box_key AS barKey, ab1.path AS path FROM box_index bi LEFT JOIN aisle_box ab ON bi.box_key = ab.box_key LEFT JOIN aisle_bar ab1 ON ab1.id = ab.aisle_id
bi.is_deleted = 0
and bi.box_key in
#{item}

SELECT count(1) as total, sum(case when bi.run_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as normal, sum(case when bi.run_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as alarm, sum(case when bi.run_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as offline FROM bus_index bi
is_deleted = 0

SELECT sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as LoadRateZero, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as lessThirty, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterThirty, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterSixty, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterNinety FROM bus_index bi
is_deleted = 0

select sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as smallCurrent, sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as lessFifteen, sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterFifteen, sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterThirty from bus_index
is_deleted =0

select t1.id as id, t1.bus_key as `unique`, concat(t1.bus_key,'-',t1.bus_name) as `name`, '6' as type, '2' as parentType from bus_index t1
t1.is_deleted = 0
NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM (
SELECT #{key} AS bus_key
) t2 WHERE t2.bus_key = t1.bus_key )
